title: Tin Foil Hat #35: Hindus, Nukes and Aliens with Shaan Joshi
description:
Welcome to another enchanting episode of Tin Foil Hat With Sam Tripoli. We loved this episode so much we decided to put it out a day early. Today, Ryan and Sam, welcome, Shaan Joshi to discuss the complex and fascinating world of the Hindu religion. On this episode we discuss....
1)Hinduism
2) Mahabharata
3) Vimanas
4) Ancient Civilizations
5) Nuclear War
6) Aliens
Thank you so much for all of your support. Please find us on
Reddit.com/tinfoilhatshow
twitter.com/madhatter39ers
instagram.com/tinfoilhatpod
and check out our tshirts
allcomedytshirts.com
